dmca.title: FAO Andrea Almeida-Associate General Counsel
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Babylon [mailto:freddieseo@babylongirls.co.uk] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 06, 2006 9:34 AM
To: DMCA
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: Re: FAO Andrea Almeida-Associate General Counsel 


Hi Team

Most of the images of girls on this page belong to Babylon girls - 
http://vipsecretsny.com/models.htm <http://vipsecretsny.com/models.htm>

 
To be specific the photos of the following girls belong to Babylon
girls. The girls photos have been taken off our web site without
permission from either the Babylon girls group or the girls themselves.

1.        Alex 
2.        Jenny 
3.        Beth 
4.        Donna 
5.        tatianna 
6.        Teddy 
7.        Zuzanna 
8.        Sierra 
9.        Bella 
10.        Kristina 
11.        Adora 
12.        Anya 
13.        Brittney 
14.        Lea 
15.        Tara

Regards
Frederick Johnson
Babylon Girls


        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: DMCA <mailto:dmca@theplanet.com>  
        To: freddieseo@babylongirls.co.uk 
        Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org 
        Sent: Monday, December 04, 2006 4:26 PM
        Subject: FW: FAO Andrea Almeida-Associate General Counsel 

        To Whom It May Concern:

         

        Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice
does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not
identify (a) the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and (b)
the material that is claimed to be infringing, and information
reasonably sufficient to permit the The Planet to locate the said
material. 

         

         

        Legal Response Team

        THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

        From: Babylon [mailto:freddieseo@babylongirls.co.uk] 
        Posted At: Friday, December 01, 2006 12:14 PM
        Posted To: Inbox
        Conversation: FAO Andrea Almeida-Associate General Counsel 
        Subject: FAO Andrea Almeida-Associate General Counsel 
        
        
        Dear Andrea
        
        re:Notification of Claimed Infringement 

                1.        A physical or electronic signature of a person
("Complaining Party") authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an
exclusive right that is claimed to be infringed; 
                        Please see below 
                2.        Identification of the copyrighted work claimed
to have been infringed, or if multiple copyrighted works at a single
online site are covered by a single notification, a representative list
of such works at that site; 
                        90% of the images of girls on this page belong
to Babylon girls - http://vipsecretsny.com/models.htm 
                3.        Identification of the material that is claimed
to be infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is
to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information
reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to locate the
material; 
                        This site http://vipsecretsny.com/models.htm
(66.98.199.132) uses our pictures of girls and they are claiming them to
be their own. 
                4.        Information reasonably sufficient to permit the
service provider to contact the Complaining Party, such as an address,
telephone number, and, if available, an electronic mail address at which
the complaining party may be contacted; 
                        This is the telephone number they have posted on
the site 212 695 0047
                        No email address has been given. 
                5.        A statement that the Complaining Party has a
good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of
is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; and 
                        The owner of Babylon girls or its agents has NOT
at any time expressed or authorized the use of the copyright material on
http://vipsecretsny.com/models.htm.
                        
                6.        A statement that the information in the
notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the
Complaining Party is authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an
exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 
                        
                        The following statement is to state that i am
authorized by the Babylon girls owner to act on their behalf regarding
the above mentioned matter.
                        We would like to protest in the strongest terms
and seek that you take action immediately, as we have call (dated
24/11/2006) the telephone number on the site and requested politely that
they remove all images that belong to Babylon girls, and to date they
havent done so.

         
         
        Kind regards
        Frederick Johnson
        Babylon Girls
